abstract: Updated: Tesla Motors has raised about $226.1 million in its initial public offering, after raising both the price of its shares and the amount of stock it planned to sell.
snippet: Updated: Tesla Motors has raised about $226.1 million in its initial public offering, after raising both the price of its shares and the amount of stock it planned to sell.
lead_paragraph: 11:16 p.m. | Updated Tesla Motors has priced its initial public offering at $17 a share, raising about $226.1 million in the first stock debut of a car maker in more than half a century, according to The Associated Press, Reuters and Bloomberg News.

headline.main: Tesla to Raise $226 Million in I.P.O.
